title: Baan Wasana
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vancouver Thai food restaurant with a separate vegetarian menu (you need to ask for it) where majority of the dishes are vegan or can be made vegan by request. Try the vegan tofu pad thai, tom yum soup, rad naa (gravy and noodles with broccoli), and pad ke mao (tofu with thai basil and rice noodles).
